definition: victory/success/to beat/to defeat/to surpass/victorious/superior to/to get the better of/better than/surpassing/superb (of vista)/beautiful (scenery)/wonderful (view)/(Taiwan pr. [sheng1]) able to bear/equal to (a task)

(after a verb or adjective) one who (is) .../(after a noun) person involved in .../-er/-ist/(used after a number or 後|后[hou4] or 前[qian2] to refer to sth mentioned previously)/(used after a term, to mark a pause before defining the term)/(old) (used at the end of a command)/(old) this

sentences.english: We were kept on tenterhooks for hours while the judges chose the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我們坐立不安了好幾個小時，等着裁判們決定獲勝者。

sentences.english: The winner of each tournament will receive an exemption into the following months tournament.
sentences.chinese: 每輪賽事的獲勝者都將獲邀免費參加下一個月的賽事。

sentences.english: The winner is the one who has successfully lifted the heaviest weight at the fewest attempts.
sentences.chinese: 試舉次數成功地舉起最重的重量的運動員爲獲勝者。

sentences.english: Eventually, one person is the winner by the end of the season.
sentences.chinese: 最後，該季節目到尾聲會淘汰到剩下一位獲勝者。

sentences.english: The winner polled twice as many votes as his opponent.
sentences.chinese: 獲勝者獲得了比對手多一倍的選票。

sentences.english: Nor is the potential for match-making limited to judges and winners.
sentences.chinese: 各種結婚限制規則對評審和獲勝者來說不算什麼。

sentences.english: The winners were presented with medals.
One boy is playing football , one boy goes to snatch.
sentences.chinese: 獲勝者是那個能夠搶奪到對方魔杖的人。

sentences.english: The first prize was bestowed upon the winner.
Rarely does the marketplace declare only one winner.
sentences.chinese: 市場幾乎不會指定只有一個獲勝者。

sentences.english: The three winners will be selected by an international jury at the International Toy Fair Nuernberg.
sentences.chinese: 在展覽期間將選出三個公司作爲獲勝者。

sentences.english: I was asked to count the ballots and announce the winner.
sentences.chinese: 我應邀點算選票並且宣佈獲勝者。

sentences.english: The winner of the auction gets to dine with Buffett.
sentences.chinese: 拍賣獲勝者能夠與巴菲特共進午餐。

sentences.english: The winner of the men's competition was a 40-year-old man.
sentences.chinese: 男歌手大賽的獲勝者是一位40歲的男士。

sentences.english: Winners stand a chance to role-play in the988idol drama.
sentences.chinese: 獲勝者有機會在988偶像劇扮演角色。
